java.util
Class TimerTask

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.TimerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public abstract class TimerTask
extends Object
implements Runnable

A task that can be scheduled for one-time or repeated execution by a Timer.

Since:
1.3
